law.catch_line: Release Of Debtors Or Persons Possessing Property
law.text: [ Text of section effective until March 31, 2012. Repealed by 2008, 521, Sec. 20. See 2008, 521, Sec. 44 as amended by 2010, 409, Sec. 23 and 2011, 224.] Payment or delivery made in good faith on the basis of the proof of authority and affidavit shall release the debtor or person having possession of the personal property to the same extent as if payment or delivery had been made to a local personal representative or local guardian or conservator.
